titles.title: Recognizing the families of the members of the Armed Forces for their contributions and sacrifices to the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 5/26/2005--Introduced. Honors the families of members of the Armed Forces. Urges the people of the United States to honor, support, and thank military families. Recognizes the contributions and sacrifices made by military families and their communities.
